about_the_game:
A Walk with Yiayia is a short adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk around the neighborhood after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall.

Please wishlist our game! Wishlists are the best way you can support the game before buying it.



Connect with Yiayia through engaging conversations, explore a beautiful, relaxing environment, and complete microquests throughout the neighborhood in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure.



No fail states, low stress, and an emotional story connecting the experiences between first generation immigrants and their family members, reflecting on what they can learn from each other's experiences.



A Walk With Yiayia is an emotional story about inspiring your grandma to get out of her comfort zone and live her life without fear.
     

Add A Walk With Yiayia to your Steam Wishlist to get notified when it goes on sale!

A Walk with Yiayia is a short adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk around the neighborhood after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall.

Connect with Yiayia through engaging conversations, explore a beautiful, relaxing environment, and complete microquests throughout the neighborhood in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure.



No fail states, low stress, and an emotional story connecting the experiences between first generation immigrants and their family members, reflecting on what they can learn from each other's experiences.



A Walk With Yiayia is an emotional story about inspiring your grandma to get out of her comfort zone and live her life without fear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Higher
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on extremely low-end systems

movies.name: A Walk With Yiayia - Official Release Date Gameplay Trailer

name: A Walk With Yiayia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with min. DX10 (shader model 4.0), 1GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo Sound
  • Additional Notes: Not tested on extremely low-end systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“. . . It’s a lovely game that gave me sincere feelings and things that I’ll think about for a while”
8.5 – The Fandomentals

“Solo developer Trent Garlipp decided to make me cry on a Tuesday . . . I urge you to not miss out on this title.”
The Indie Informer

“A Walk With Yiayia is a 'thoughtful, bite-sized adventure' about the importance of family”
PCGamer
short_description: A Walk with Yiayia is a heartfelt solo-developed, bite-sized adventure game about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she's lost her confidence from a scary fall. Connect through engaging conversations, explore a relaxing environment, and complete microquests in this thoughtful adventure.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Japanese
